actions.command: data modify entity @s Attributes[{Name: "minecraft:generic.armor"}].Base set value 15
execute at @s at @e[type=player,distance=..5] run particle flash

name: Pack Upgrades
description: Hitting a wolf with an iron armor or diamond chestplate will apply armor to that wolf (15 or 20 armor respectively).[NOTICE]: Armor enchantments have no effect and downgrading wolfs is possible. Wolves will display the last upgrade they got via the color of their collar. Hitting a wolf with a netherite ingot will make it immune to knockback. Finally, hitting a wolf with a golden apple with upgrade it to a dire wolf, while using an enchanted golden apple will make it into an ancient dire wolf.
